hostage:
Slowly everything faded to black, you hope begin dwindled along with your conciousness and everything faded to black.
Suddenly, you feel a shock to your heart and are awoken!
As you come to your senses, the truth begins to set in: You haven't been saved, you have been captured!

As the life faded from your eyes, all you could do is hope...
Hope that somebody will find you, somebody will save you and somebody will get you home.
Suddenly, you wake up on board a strange vessel, with no comprehension of how you ended up here.
A short life in the slavery market is what seems to remain of your future...
